Aug. 19, 2000 D Brass in the Park Section B
Brass in the Park Section B 20 March & Hymn Contest Brass in the Park brass-in-the-park-section-b
Newtongrange Public Park For First and Second Section Bands
First Prize The Menzies Dougal W.S. Trophy and 700 Winners Kingdom Brass
Additional Award The Dean Tavern Trophy for the best Second Section Band
Winners Selkirk Silver
Oct. 21, 2009, 9:44 p.m. March 1, 2010, 9:46 p.m.
